data_table.description: MRI Scan and Neuropsychological (NP) Battery Dates and Exclusions for Offspring Cohort Participants, 1999 - 2012. This dataset contains possible exclusions that can be used when analyzing the datasets t_mrbrnm1_2011_m_0891, t_mrbrnm2_2012_a_0892 and vr_np_2012_a_0893. This dataset contains brain MRI and NP dates for exclusions only. To get complete set of MRI or NP dates see separate datasets containing test dates.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.name: np_x7_excludeON
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of their NP battery closest to Exam 7

variable.name: mr_x7_excludeON
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of their MRI scan closest to Exam 7

variable.name: np_x8_excludeON
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of their NP battery closest to Exam 8

variable.name: mr_x8_excludeON
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of their MRI scan closest to Exam 8

variable.name: np_x7fu_excludeON
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of their follow-up NP battery
variable.value: Unknown status at time of NP

variable.name: mr_x7fu_excludeON
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of their follow-up MRI scan

variable.name: np_x7_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent dementia at the time of their NP battery closest to Exam 7

variable.name: np_x7_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent stroke at the time of their NP battery closest to Exam 7

variable.name: mr_x7_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent dementia at the time of their MRI scan closest to Exam 7
variable.value: Unknown status at time of MRI

variable.name: mr_x7_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent stroke at the time of their MRI scan closest to Exam 7

variable.name: np_x8_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent dementia at the time of their NP battery closest to Exam 8
variable.value: Unknown status at time of NP

variable.name: np_x8_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent stroke at the time of their NP battery closest to Exam 8

variable.name: mr_x8_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent dementia at the time of their MRI scan closest to Exam 8
variable.value: Unknown status at time of MRI

variable.name: mr_x8_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent stroke at the time of their MRI scan closest to Exam 8

variable.name: np_x7fu_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent dementia at the time of their follow-up NP battery
variable.value: Unknown status at time of NP

variable.name: np_x7fu_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent stroke at the time of their follow-up NP battery

variable.name: mr_x7fu_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent dementia at the time of their follow-up MRI scan
variable.value: Unknown status at time of MRI

variable.name: mr_x7fu_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent stroke at the time of their follow-up MRI scan

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant ID number.

variable.name: MR_X7_date
variable.description: Date of participant's MRI scan that is closest to Exam 7 (within 1 year before or 5 years after Exam 7 date)
variable.comment: For display purposes, only month and year are listed. Number of days since Exam 1.

variable.name: MR_X8_date
variable.description: Date of participant's MRI scan that is closest to Exam 8 (within 1 year before or 5 years after Exam 8 date)
variable.comment: For display purposes, only month and year are listed. Number of days since Exam 1.

variable.name: NP_X7_date
variable.description: Date of participant's NP battery that is closest to Exam 7 (within 1 year before or 5 years after Exam 7 date)
variable.comment: For display purposes, only month and year are listed. Number of days since Exam 1.

variable.name: NP_X8_date
variable.description: Date of participant's NP battery that is closest to Exam 8 (within 1 year before or 5 years after Exam 8 date)
variable.comment: For display purposes, only month and year are listed. Number of days since Exam 1.

variable.name: mr_x7FU_date
variable.description: Date of participant's follow-up MRI scan (at least 1 year after their baseline Exam 7 MRI scan)
variable.comment: For display purposes, only month and year are listed. Number of days since Exam 1.

variable.name: np_x7FU_date
variable.description: Date of participant's follow-up NP battery (at least 1 year after their baseline Exam 7 NP battery)
variable.comment: For display purposes, only month and year are listed. Number of days since Exam 1.
